department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Veterans Canada seeks broadcast media monitoring services. RFP published under Stream 4 of PSPC supply arrangement (SA) #EN578-191713. Qualified respondents to submit proposals by March 25, 2023.
description: The Department of Veterans Affairs needs Broadcast media monitoring services for its clients.
duration_in_months: [Has a 2 year duration that ends April 2026]
tags: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**[RFI Observation: System Messages Generation of Facility Facilities  Media Broadcasting Monitoring  ]**
-----------------------------

**Title**: Request for Proposal (RFP) - Media Monitoring Services for Veterans Affairs Canada

**Reference Number**: WS4472445744-Doc4472523331

**Access Method for Tendering**: Procurement.Ca ""

**Application Deadline**:	Friday, April 2, 2024  - 14:00 Eastern Time

**RFP Description**: Media Monitoring Services are a solicitation against PSPC supply arrangement (SA) #EN578-191713 under Stream 4 : Media Monitoring for Broadcasting. This request invites qualified bidders to provide services that monitor and report on media items, as required by the Veteran's Department.
